content.raw:
Hi all,

I think it is high time this be merged. My reading is that there is no problem with licensing since we are not bundling anything.

Dan, if it's ok with you I'll rename the file to be something about PointgGrey/FLIR as Russ suggests, and graft everything over into a pull request in labscript_devices instead. Should preserve commit history, which will be useful since there have been bugfixes etc here since the pull request was initially made.
content.html:
Hi all,

I think it is high time this be merged. My reading is that there is no problem with licensing since we are not bundling anything.

Dan, if it's ok with you I'll rename the file to be something about PointgGrey/FLIR as Russ suggests, and graft everything over into a pull request in labscript_devices instead. Should preserve commit history, which will be useful since there have been bugfixes etc here since the pull request was initially made.
